HTTPCommManager(java.net.URL url)
          Contructs a new HTTPCommManager object using the specified URL to refer to the remote host/service (usually a Web Server listening for HTTP request on port 80).

Method Detail

allowUserInteraction

public void allowUserInteraction(boolean userInteraction)
allowUserInteraction allows the user to be queried for passwords. Note that the HttpURLConnection itself has no facilities for executing such a query. The query must be carried out by an external program such as a browser or browser plugin.
Parameters:
userInteraction - is a boolean value indicating true if the user can be queried for a password.

             throws java.lang.Exception

listen

public boolean listen(int port)
               throws java.lang.Exception
listen opens a server socket connection on the specified port to listen for client requests. listen is an unsupported operation in this class.
Overrides:
listen in class CommManagerAdapter

listen

public boolean listen(int port,
                      int timeout)
               throws java.lang.Exception
listen opens a server socket connection on the specified port to listen for client requests for a specified number of milliseconds before the operation times out. listen is an unsupported operation in this class.
Overrides:
listen in class CommManagerAdapter
Parameters:
port - is an integer specifying the port on which to listen for client request.
timeout - is an integer value specifying the number of milliseconds before the operation times out.

sendGETRequest

public java.lang.Object sendGETRequest(java.util.Properties query)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
sendGETRequest sends a GET request to the remote host/service referred to by the URL object, appended with the specified query String.
Parameters:
query:Ljava.util.Properties - object containing the name/value pairs for the query String.
Returns:
a Ljava.lang.Object representation of the content sent by the server to this client.

sendPOSTRequest

public java.lang.Object sendPOSTRequest(RequestResponse reqResp)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
sendPOSTRequest sends a POST request to the remote host/service using the specified RequestResponse object to encapsulate request information and to receive the server's response.
Parameters:
reqResp:Ljjb.toolbox.comm.RequestResponse - object encapsulating client request and server response information.
Returns:
a Ljava.lang.Object of the content received by the client contained in the RequestResponse object.

setDoInput

public void setDoInput(boolean doInput)
setDoInput sets whether the HTTPCommManager object can receive information from the remote host/service.
Parameters:
doInput - is a boolean value indicating true if the http connection can receive content using the input stream, false otherwise.

setDoOutput

public void setDoOutput(boolean doOutput)
setDoOutput sets whether the HTTCommManager object can send information over the wire to the remote host/service.
Parameters:
doOutput - is a boolean value indicating true if this http connection can send content using the output stream, false otherwise.

setURL

public void setURL(java.net.URL url)
setURL sets the url to the remote host/service in which this CommManagerIF object will communicate.
Parameters:
url:Ljava.net.URL - uniform resource locator to the remote host/service.

setUseCaches

public void setUseCaches(boolean caching)
setUseCaches sets whether the http connection should cache the content received from the remote host/service for quick reference on subsequent duplicate request.
Parameters:
caching - is a boolean value indicating true is requests should be cached.

toURLEncodedString

public java.lang.String toURLEncodedString(java.util.Properties args)
toURLEncodedString converts a Properties object to an URL-encoded query String of the form: name=value&...
Parameters:
args:Ljava.util.Properties - is the list of arguments to form the query.
Returns:
a Ljava.lang.String URL encoded query of the property arguments.
